description:
The recent change in the RPC code setting self.exclusive=True on Consumers seems to have caused a problem with the FanoutPublisher. When running compute, the initial fanout publisher is created as expected, but when periodic_tasks() fires and rpc.py tries to create another instance, the following traceback is received:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/1808/
title: FanoutPublisher calls attempt to redeclare the exchange

comments.content:
The recent change in the RPC code setting self.exclusive=True on Consumers seems to have caused a problem with the FanoutPublisher. When running compute, the initial fanout publisher is created as expected, but when periodic_tasks() fires and rpc.py tries to create another instance, the following traceback is received:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/1808/
